name: Entropia Universe
notes:
Will fail to download fully on first launch. Second launch allows you to download other files.

Doesn't render everything well. At least not on Nvidia.

Pausing download when in-game crashes the game.
content:
files:
- setup: http://install2.entropiauniverse.com/entropia_universe_setup.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Entropia Universe/bin32/ClientLoader.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2012 win7
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /silent
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: (Default)
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\MindArk\Entropia Universe
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: (value not set)
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: Language
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MindArk\Entropia Universe\Language
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000001'
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: BGDownloadInitialized
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MindArk\Entropia Universe\DynamicContent
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000001'
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: BGDownloadList
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MindArk\Entropia Universe\DynamicContent
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: ''
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: Language
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_USERS\S-1-5-21-0-0-0-1000\Software\MindArk\Entropia Universe\Language
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000001'
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: BGDownloadInitialized
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_USERS\S-1-5-21-0-0-0-1000\Software\MindArk\Entropia Universe\DynamicContent
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000001'
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: BGDownloadList
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_USERS\S-1-5-21-0-0-0-1000\Software\MindArk\Entropia Universe\DynamicContent
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: ''
system:
  env:
    PBA_ENABLE: 1
wine:
  version: esync-staging-pba-3.16-x86_64
